title: Burn Energy Drink logo font
content:
Hi,

does anybody know what font is used in this logo. I've attached a sample. Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [burn2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141201201909/http:/typophile.com/files/burn2.jpg) | 6.17 KB |
author: mspective

comments.content: It looks an awful lot like [Venacti](http://web.archive.org/web/20141201201909/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/venacti/) bold and horizontally scaled.
Please keep in mind that this logo was most probably custom designed. The fact that the letter shapes are so simple makes this even more likely.
I suspect the same, as the "u" and "n" are the same character. However, I was just trying to give them something close.

Thanks tearsforsappho! That's almost the typeface, although I think there was just a condensed version of Venacti in use, or as you supposed just simply scaled. I think the combination with the FF Din (i think it is the Din) doesn't look bad. Below you can see the whole composition of the logo.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141201201909im_/http:/typophile.com/files/burn3_4472.jpg)

\> _(…) I was just trying to give them something close._

Yes, definitely, good call -- didn't want to sound as if I disapproved you giving close alternatives. ;^)
